name: Trekking
description: Embark on unforgettable journeys through the Himalayas
detailedDescription: Experience the ultimate adventure through Nepal's stunning mountain landscapes. Our expertly crafted trekking expeditions take you deep into the heart of the Himalayas, from lush rhododendron forests to high-altitude passes adorned with prayer flags. Whether you're a seasoned trekker or a first-time adventurer, we offer routes suited to all experience levels.
features: Expert certified guides with extensive mountain experience
Small group sizes for personalized attention
All necessary permits and paperwork handled
Safety equipment and emergency evacuation insurance
Flexible itineraries to match your pace

name: Cultural Tours
description: Immerse yourself in Nepal's rich heritage and traditions
detailedDescription: Discover the cultural treasures of Nepal with our carefully curated tours. Explore ancient temples, sacred monasteries, and UNESCO World Heritage sites while experiencing the warmth of Nepalese hospitality. Our cultural tours blend history, spirituality, and local traditions for an enriching journey through time.

name: Peak Climbing
description: Summit the world's most spectacular peaks
detailedDescription: Take your mountain adventure to new heights with our peak climbing expeditions. Nepal offers numerous trekking peaks ranging from 5,000m to 6,500m, perfect for climbers looking to experience high-altitude mountaineering. Our experienced climbing sherpas and comprehensive safety protocols ensure your summit attempt is both thrilling and safe.

name: Expeditions
detailedDescription: For the ultimate mountaineering challenge, join our expeditions to the world's highest peaks. From Mount Everest to Cho Oyu, our comprehensive expedition packages include everything needed for a successful summit bid. With decades of Himalayan experience, our team provides world-class logistics, safety management, and summit support.
features: Western guide and Sherpa support team
